coreAttributes.name: piercing ring
coreAttributes.description: A ring that's designed to fit into a pierced penis. A removable segment on one side allows the wearer to easily slide the ring into place.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and [npc.verb(slide)] the ring into [npc.her] pierced [npc.cock].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and [npc.verb(slide)] the ring into [npc2.namePos] pierced [npc2.cock].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and roughly [npc.verb(slide)] the ring into [npc2.namePos] pierced [npc2.cock].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and [npc.verb(slide)] the ring out of [npc.her] pierced [npc.cock].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and [npc.verb(slide)] the ring out of [npc2.namePos] pierced [npc2.cock].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] out the removable segment and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the ring out of [npc2.namePos] pierced [npc2.cock].
